top_stories.title: Nvidia’s reportedly asking Chinese customers to pay upfront for its H200 AI chips
top_stories.description: Nvidia is now requiring its customers in China to pay upfront in full for its H200 AI chips even as approval stateside and from Beijing remains uncertain.
top_stories.author: Kate Park
top_stories.content: Nvidia is now requiring its customers in China to pay upfront in full for its H200 AI chips even as approval stateside and from Beijing remains uncertain.

top_stories.title: LLM-Pruning Collection: A JAX Based Repo For Structured And Unstructured LLM Compression
top_stories.description: Zlab Princeton researchers have released LLM-Pruning Collection, a JAX based repository that consolidates major pruning algorithms for large language models into a single, reproducible framework. It targets one concrete goal, make it easy to compare block level, layer level and weight level pruning methods under a consistent training and evaluation stack on both GPUs and […] The post LLM-Pruning Collection: A JAX Based Repo For Structured And Unstructured LLM Compression appeared first on...
top_stories.author: Shobha Kakkar
top_stories.content: Zlab Princeton researchers have released LLM-Pruning Collection, a JAX based repository that consolidates major pruning algorithms for large language models into a single, reproducible framework. It targets one concrete goal, make it easy to compare block level, layer level and weight level pruning methods under a consistent training and evaluation stack on both GPUs and […] The post LLM-Pruning Collection: A JAX Based Repo For Structured And Unstructured LLM Compression appeared first on...

top_stories.title: Caterpillar partners with Nvidia to put AI in excavators
top_stories.description: Caterpillar partners with Nvidia to integrate AI into its construction machinery, piloting the Cat AI assistive system on the Cat 306 CR Mini Excavator using Nvidia’s Jetson Thor platform, with a demonstration at CES on Wednesday. The Cat AI system operates on a fleet of AI agents. Brandon Hootman, vice president of data and AI […]
top_stories.author: Kerem Gülen
top_stories.content: Caterpillar partners with Nvidia to integrate AI into its construction machinery, piloting the Cat AI assistive system on the Cat 306 CR Mini Excavator using Nvidia’s Jetson Thor platform, with a demonstration at CES on Wednesday. The Cat AI system operates on a fleet of AI agents. Brandon Hootman, vice president of data and AI […]

top_stories.title: AI Modernization: Making Intelligence Accessible, Secure, and Scalable
top_stories.description: AI Modernization enables secure, scalable intelligence by integrating analytics, vector search, and self-service access across enterprise data. Artificial intelligence (AI) has crossed the hype threshold. Today, organizations no longer ask whether to adopt AI — they ask how to do it responsibly, efficiently, and in a way that aligns with... The post AI Modernization: Making Intelligence Accessible, Secure, and Scalable first appeared on AI-Tech Park.
top_stories.author: Karla Nussbaumer
top_stories.content: AI Modernization enables secure, scalable intelligence by integrating analytics, vector search, and self-service access across enterprise data. top_stories.title: The unseen work of building reliable AI agents
top_stories.description: "Reinforcement learning gyms" train agents on the many low-level tasks that they must chain together to execute customer requests.
top_stories.author: Jason Laster
top_stories.content: "Reinforcement learning gyms" train agents on the many low-level tasks that they must chain together to execute customer requests.
